de.gianfelice.aeskulab.ui.components
Class ImageManager

java.lang.Object
  com.vaadin.ui.AbstractComponent
      com.vaadin.ui.AbstractComponentContainer
          com.vaadin.ui.CustomComponent
              de.gianfelice.aeskulab.ui.components.ImageManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.vaadin.event.MethodEventSource, com.vaadin.terminal.Paintable, com.vaadin.terminal.Sizeable, com.vaadin.terminal.VariableOwner, com.vaadin.ui.Button.ClickListener, com.vaadin.ui.Component, com.vaadin.ui.ComponentContainer, com.vaadin.ui.Upload.FailedListener, com.vaadin.ui.Upload.FinishedListener, com.vaadin.ui.Upload.ProgressListener, com.vaadin.ui.Upload.Receiver, com.vaadin.ui.Upload.StartedListener, com.vaadin.ui.Upload.SucceededListener, ConfirmationWindow.ButtonOkListener, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener
public class ImageManager
extends com.vaadin.ui.CustomComponent
implements com.vaadin.ui.Button.ClickListener, ConfirmationWindow.ButtonOkListener, com.vaadin.ui.Upload.FailedListener, com.vaadin.ui.Upload.FinishedListener, com.vaadin.ui.Upload.ProgressListener, com.vaadin.ui.Upload.StartedListener, com.vaadin.ui.Upload.SucceededListener, com.vaadin.ui.Upload.Receiver

A component to manage images, that are linked to Property objects. This layout offers upload, display and removing of images.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Matthias Gianfelice
See Also:
Serialized Form
